actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that landlords using an accrual method of accounting may not deduct real property taxes on their rental property until such taxes are paid.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, that landlords using an accrual method of accounting may not deduct real property taxes on their rental property until such taxes are paid.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that landlords using an accrual method of accounting may not deduct real property taxes on their rental property until such taxes are paid.
